## assertParameterIsNaturalNumber() function

throws if the parameter is not a natural number

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertParameterIsNaturalNumber(variable: string, n: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variable | <code>string</code> | variable name |
|  n | <code>number</code> | value of the variable |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
